# WAError.deviceInvalid(_:)

**Case**

An error that occurs if your app specifies a paired device it doesn’t have access to.

## Declaration

```swift
case deviceInvalid(WAError.DeviceInvalidDetails)
```

## Checking for invalid device

- **WAError.DeviceInvalidDetails**: The optional details describing the device that’s invalid.

items.description: The optional details describing the device that’s invalid.
items.name: WAError.DeviceInvalidDetails
